string.text: Guitar

An acoustic guitar, often used by stalkers to pass time and boost morale around campfires.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Recreational
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] Playable
Harmonica

A simple, portable instrument favored by stalkers for its ease of use and melancholic tunes.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Recreational
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] Playable
Survival Kit

A compact all-purpose kit containing fabric, sewing needles and a few leather strips primarily used as a means to stop bleeding and treat lacerations.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_green] • %c[pda_white] Post-heals: T(8)%c[pda_white]•••••••• %c[pda_white]A(3)%c[pda_white]••• %c[pda_white]L(3)%c[pda_white]•••
Wrist Watch

An old, classic Soviet watch, reliable for checking the time in moments where a PDA could be unreliable due to strong electromagnetic waves from emissions or nearby anomalous fields.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Checking the time
Ball-peen Hammer

A type of peening hammer primarily used in metalworking.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Duct Tape

Commonly used in situations that require a strong and flexible tape; often an easy, yet temporary solution for quick repair jobs.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Syringe

A reusable medical syringe. With the proper equipment and knowledge, this could come in handy for the creation of various types of drugs.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Field Cutlery

A compact set of utensils designed for eating in the field, reducing the need to rely on dirty hands or scavenged tools. It’s basic, but every stalker appreciates a clean meal.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Industrial Grease

A semi-solid lubricant often applied to maintain equipment, weapons, or machinery exposed to dirt or other debris.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Plastic Jar

A lightweight, sealed container ideal for storing liquids, food, or scavenged materials. It is ideal for keeping the contents free of moisture or other airborne contaminants.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Rope

A length of sturdy rope. These serve many purposes, especially in a place like the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Radio (Broken)

A handheld communication device. Music is a good way to calm your nerves, but this radio is of little use with a broken antenna.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Steel Wool

A bundle of very fine steel filament strands used as an abrasive in finishing and repair work.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Telescopic Mirror

A small mirror mounted on a telescopic iron tube often used to peek around corners.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Welding Goggles

Welding goggles with an old leather band. Designed to provide eye protection while welding or cutting though the wear and tear on these suggest they would do neither.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Old Batteries

A collection of spent batteries that once powered devices but are now depleted and unusable. Though no longer functional, they may still be recyclable or repurposed.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Old Field Shovel

A compact, foldable shovel used in outdoor or military settings, showing signs of rust, dirt, and wear. Despite its condition, it may still be functional or repurposed.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Junk
Old Hammer

A heavily used hand tool with a worn wooden handle and a head bearing dents. Though aged, it may still be functional or repurposed.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Old Leather Boots

A pair of rugged, timeworn boots made of thick leather, with scuffed surfaces and soles worn from extensive use.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Old Leather Gloves

A pair of well-worn gloves made of durable leather, bearing creases, stains, and signs of heavy use.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Old Metal Shovel

A worn digging tool with a sturdy metal blade, showing signs of long-term use. Despite its age, it may still be functional or repurposed.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Junk
Old Military Battery Unit

– A decommissioned or expired power storage device previously used in military equipment. Though no longer functional, it may still have value for refurbishment or recycling.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Old Spare Weapon Parts

Heavily weatherd and worn spare weapon parts. In this condition, they are hardly a, let alone usable.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Old Underwear

An extra pair of underwear could substantially increase your comfort. Unfortunately, this pair's history is unknown.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Broken Detector

A non-functional Bear detector. While it is no longer operational, it can still be valuable for spare part and components.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Broken Flashlight

A damaged flashlight, no longer operational but still valuable for spare components.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Broken Head Lamp

An old, non-functional head lamp.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Junk
Broken Radio

A small radio in poor condition. Dirty and damaged by moisture, the interior seems to be in quite bad shape.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Broken Walkie Talkie

The display is dead and there is a constant hiss from the speaker indicating that this is of no use.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Drug Distribution Notes

Records detailing the distribution, pricing, and logistics of illicit substances. These notes contain contacts and transaction histories for trafficking operations.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Engineering Manual

A comprehensive reference guide providing technical details, calculations, and methodologies for engineering applications. Because of this, it is more often used as a recreational read in the Zone than something of value.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Map-making Kit

A set of tools and materials used to create detailed and accurate maps. It typically includes compasses, rulers, specialized paper, and drawing instruments, all in a waterproof and camouflaged cover.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Mechanics Manual

A technical guide containing instructions for the maintenance, repair, and operation of machinery or vehicles. It includes diagrams, troubleshooting steps, and specifications to assist users in keeping equipment functional. Because of this, it is more often used as a recreational read in the Zone than something of value.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Mein Kampf

A political manifesto written by Adolf Hitler, outlining his ideology and plans for Germany's future under Nazi rule. The book played a significant role in shaping Nazi policies and is widely regarded as a historical document of extremism.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Military Maps

Detailed geographic representations used for strategic planning and operations in military contexts. Included are topographical data, enemy positions, supply routes, and tactical objectives.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Personal Journal

A partially filled notebook containing personal writings, reflections, or notes, with blank or lightly used pages remaining. It may hold sentimental value while still serving as a practical space for new thoughts or entries.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Photo of a Loved One

A cherished image capturing a meaningful moment with a close friend or family member. Who or where this person is now is unknown.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Russian PLAYBOY

A regional edition of the internationally recognized Playboy magazine, featuring a mix of lifestyle articles, interviews, and adult-themed photography tailored to Russian audiences. It combines entertainment, fashion, and cultural commentary with its signature provocative imagery.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Ukrainian MAXIM

A Ukrainian edition of MAXIM, a popular men's lifestyle magazine known for its mix of celebrity interviews, humor, fashion, and photography. It caters to readers with interests in entertainment, fitness, and modern trends.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Ukrainian Special Forces Survival Guide

A heavily worn manual containing expert survival techniques, ranging from navigation to field medicine. Its pages offer life-saving knowledge for anyone venturing into the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Bed Spread

A luxury item in the Zone. Having a sleeping bag and a bed spread may prove essential if you don't want to hit the wall in the most inappropriate of circumstances.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Deck of Cards

Playing cards are a popular pastime. The cover depicts the proud architectural design of the Moscow Metro.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Recreational
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Passing Time
Decorated Jewellery Box

An ornate, well-crafted box, likely looted from a pre-Zone home, sometimes used to store small valuables or keepsakes. Its sentimental value often outweighs its practical worth.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Junk
Synthetic Ropes

A synthetic rope of around 5-meters in length. A good rope serves many purposes, especially in a place like the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
Tarpaulin

A large sheet of strong, flexible, water-resistant or waterproof material with reinforced grommets at the corners and along the sides to form attachment points for rope.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
